flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: Many of our pets love their regular feeding schedules. However, if you're only gone for a day it's difficult to justify hiring a pet sitter. Here's a simple project that uses inexpensive parts that lets you not only remotely feed your pet from another location, but also watch them happily eat their meal!

guide.summary: Learn how to build a remote-activated pet feeding system to feed your pet while you're away from the house.
guide.title: How to feed your pet remotely with a USB rocket launcher
